name.description: First name of the student doing this delivery.

surname.description: Surname or surnames of the student doing this delivery.

email.description: Institutional URV email of the student doing this delivery. e.g. fulano.detal@estudiants.urv.cat

repo.description: Name of the git repository of the delivery, previously assigned to the delivering student, in the DEIM git servers. e.g. comp_34, comp_20...

role.description: Role of the student in the delivery, as specified in the guides. Possible values: prog1, prog2, prog3 or prog4.

phase.description: Phase that is being delivered. Possible values: 1 or 2.

call.description: Call of delivery. 1 for first call, 2 for second, 3 for additional and 4 for exceptional.

test.description: Git commit SHA identifier of the delivered test commit in the previously specified repo in the repo property.

fusion.description: Git commit SHA identifier of the delivered fusion commit in the previously specified repo in the repo property.

lab.description: Number of the laboratory assigned to student, for example 1 for laboratory L1, 2 for laboratory L2... Minimum is 1 and maximum depends on the number of laboratories implemented in the course.

blocks.description: Blocks implemented by the student in this delivery, as specified in this guides.
